title: Stealing Fire from the Gods - James Bonnet
description:
Considered by many top professionals to be the most definitive and comprehensive guide to all things related to story and storymaking, this expanded, completely revised and long awaited second edition of Stealing Fire from the Gods, The Complete Guide to Story for Writers and Filmmakers, incorporates many of the advances evolved in James Bonnetâ€™s professional workshops over the last seven years. 

These include new revelations concerning the essence of story (that without which there would be no story), the high concept great idea, the structures of the whole story passage, the anti-heroâ€™s journey, the threat (the cause of the problem), the value being pursued, the ultimate source of unity, and the use of the quintessential to make your characters not only memorable and merchandisable but truly charismatic. It also contains a critical assessment of the three act structure, many new and completely revised illustrations, and the analyses of many important new stories and successful films
